charaepi_ch0106_11_kamitsure/2301_1201_0: What a coincidence seeing you here.

Or did you come because you heard us
battling?
Cheren has Tornadus, and Bianca has Virizion.

Since each of our partners is a Legendary
Pokémon from Unova...
we thought it’d be good to train together.

When these three Pokémon clash, they’re like
a dazzling flash of lights.
It was amazing! And we learned a lot.
charaepi_ch0106_11_kamitsure/2301_1201_1:
Legendary Pokémon have this hidden shine
inside them that’s so strong, it’s electrifying.
But they can be dangerous, too.

Apparently, Thundurus has been seen flying
around Unova causing trouble.

Eyewitnesses say the lightning it shoots all
over the place can cause forest fires.

I’m not sure they were talking about this
Thundurus, but...

now that it’s my partner Pokémon, I hope to
see more of its electrifying talent—not just
its mischief.
What’s your Thundurus usually like, Elesa?

If I had to choose one word to describe it,
I’d say...free-spirited.

It flies around the wide open sky whenever
it wants.
charaepi_ch0106_11_kamitsure/2301_1201_2:
As time goes on, people start holding
themselves back without even realizing it.

That can come from others’ expectations,
a role they were given...
or a belief they must act a certain way.

But when I see Thundurus living how it
pleases...

it reminds me the importance of being true
to myself.

I think I see a connection between you two,
[Name:PlayerNickname ].
charaepi_ch0106_11_kamitsure/2301_0401_2: Not entirely—but in living freely, yes.
charaepi_ch0106_11_kamitsure/2301_0402_3:
Exactly. Both you and Thundurus shock my
heart through and through.
charaepi_ch0106_11_kamitsure/2301_1201_3:
For me to stay true to myself...and for my
Pokémon to feel they can be themselves,
too...
I must never lose sight of my own sparkle.

I’ll continue to be a Trainer worthy of a
Legendary Pokémon!
